language.name: gb
language.keywords: Lavor, open source, applications, education, revolutionize, future, educational institutions, democratization, obsolescence, blinke
language.description: Lavor is the open source environment that brings together applications aimed at education to revolutionize how our future develops in educational institutions, democratizing education and eliminating the obsolescence that exists in education.

hero.title: Total Technological Revolution for Education
hero.subtitle: 21st century education is possible for EVERYONE thanks to Lavor

services.title: Everything that connects to our educational institutions

first.title: Facilitating educational materials with Larn
first.subtitle: Now teachers and students can easily share and use dozens of knowledge repositories from various fields, facilitating study.

second.title: Connecting knowledge with TripL
second.subtitle: Discover educational diversity in institutional communities, share and be part of the benefits of continued learning

third.title: Automating the educational experience with Lavor
third.subtitle: Forget about the bureaucratic and administrative side of education and studying in the digital age, use the latest technologies to teach without borders

calltofirst.title: The future of education, generalized and today
calltofirst.first: Use AI to best deploy your subject's knowledge
calltofirst.second: Apply the best gamification techniques in your environment
calltofirst.third: Get yourself and your students into the future of technology, today

calltosecond.title: Forge a community that helps you never stop learning
calltosecond.first: Relearn the best way to design your future
calltosecond.second: Use the latest technologies to showcase your passion
calltosecond.third: Share your projects with the world and achieve your goal by sharing your identity

faq.title: Be a part of helping us build a tech future together

first.title: Where can I use Lavor?
first.content: In any field. You can use it to learn and connect with your educational community or even share knowledge among all students in institutions that use Lavor

second.title: How much does it cost to learn how to use Lavor?
second.content: Nothing. We strive to develop didactic and intuitive applications, and for useful functionalities there is always a great learning source, such as AI, videos, blogs, forums, among other tools so that you don't have to do it all yourself, which is the objective of Lavor

footer.description: Total technological revolution for education and never stop learning
